snippet.title: The Last Alchemist | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now on Steam: https://bit.ly/TheLastAlchemist
Master the wonders of alchemy in The Last Alchemist!

Solve alchemical puzzles by transforming and combining Essences. Craft items, tools and machines. Explore the enchanting world, gather peculiar resources, and befriend the Agari, adorable mushroom folk who will help you find the cure for your mysterious disease.

Follow us on:
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/M8AyV5USEr
Web: https://marvelousgames.com/https://marvelousgames.com/games/the-last-alchemist
Twitter: http://twitter.com/marvelouseurope
